body.p:
Logan county Ky April 28/63
To his Excellency The Governor of Ky

Whereas Coleman Briggs has been fined by the court circuit court of Logan County, Ky on a charge of Misdemeanor. Said case has been pending in Said court about two years and at the time of coming up said Briggs (as we are informed and believe) was about one Hundred Miles distant and Sick and could not attend. Consequently there was no defence made we the undersigned therefore Humbly pray you to Remit the fine together with the costs. the amount of the fine is Ten Dollars
This is Most Respectfully Submitted for your immediate consideration
